mapper.sql: id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, goods_id, coupon_id
mapper.select: select a.association_id as goods_id,a.coupon_id,b.name,b.type,b.discount,b.discount_full_money,b.reduction_full_money,b.reduction_post_money from am_coupon_rel_coupon_goods a,am_coupon b where b.del_flag = 0 and b.scope = 1

select a.association_id as goods_id,a.coupon_id,b.name,b.type,b.discount,b.discount_full_money,b.reduction_full_money,b.reduction_post_money from am_coupon_rel_coupon_goods a,am_coupon b,pm_goods c where b.del_flag = 0 and c.del_flag = 0 and b.scope = 2 and a.coupon_id = b.id and c.goods_category_id = a.association_id and c.id = #{goodsCategoryId}

select DISTINCT a.id as goodsId,a.name as goodsName,b.coupon_id,c.name as couponName from pm_goods a left join am_coupon_rel_coupon_goods b on b.association_id = a.id left join am_coupon c on c.id = b.coupon_id and c.del_flag = 0 where a.del_flag = 0 and a.publish_status = 1 and b.id is not null and c.id is not null and a.id = #{goodsId}
